title: kAntimati annai
sahitya:
kAndtimati annai nI gati kAttaruL karuNAnidhi amba


A:  shAnti pera engum tEDi vandaDainda kumbha munik-karuL shambhu uLam kavarcaraNam    kaNya mighu tiru veedikaLilangum kaniyinum iniya tamizh marai muzhangum
puNya nadhiyil shiranda tAmiraparNi vaDakarai nellai padi vaLar
